mapper.select: select id as id, user_name as userName, password as password, pay_password as payPassword, user_phone as userPhone, realname as realname, realname_status as realnameStatus, realname_time as realnameTime, status as status, id_number as idNumber, user_sex as userSex, user_age as userAge from user_info where user_phone=#{userPhone}

select user_name as userName, realname as realname, customer_type as customerType, user_phone as userPhone, id_number as idNumber, status as status, user_Phone as userPhone from user_info where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select id as id, user_name as userName, password as password, pay_password as payPassword, realname as realname, realname_status as realnameStatus, realname_time as realnameTime, real_count as realCount, last_full_time as lastFullTime, id_number as idNumber, user_sex as userSex, user_age as userAge, qq as qq, user_phone as userPhone, taobao_account as taobaoAccount, email as email, userRace, sign_switch as signSwitch, work_industry as workIndustry from user_info where id = #{id}

select id as id, user_name as userName, password as password, pay_password as payPassword, user_phone as userPhone, realname as realname, realname_status as realnameStatus, realname_time as realnameTime, status as status, id_number as idNumber, user_sex as userSex, user_age as userAge from user_info where id_number= #{idCard}

select id as id, user_name as userName, user_phone as userPhone, status as status from user_info where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into user_info( id, user_name, password, user_phone, create_time, create_ip, invite_userid, equipment_number, user_from, realname, user_sex, qq, tg_flag, client_type, brower_type, update_time ) values( #{id}, #{userName}, #{password}, #{userPhone}, NOW(), #{createIp}, #{inviteUserid}, #{equipmentNumber}, #{userFrom}, #{realname}, #{userSex}, #{qq}, #{tgFlag}, #{clientType}, #{browerType}, NOW() )
mapper.select: select id as id, user_name as userName, password as password, pay_password as payPassword, user_phone as userPhone, realname as realname, realname_status as realnameStatus, id_number as idNumber, amount_max as amountMax, status as status, amount_available as amountAvailable from user_info where user_name=#{username} and password=#{password}
mapper.update:
update user_info
amount_available = #{amountAvailable},
customer_type=#{customerType},
update_time = NOW()
where id = #{id}

update user_info
user_name = #{userName},
password = #{password},
pay_password = #{payPassword},
realname = #{realname},
realname_status = #{realnameStatus},
realname_time = #{realnameTime},
id_number = #{idNumber},
province = #{province},
user_sex = #{userSex},
user_age = #{userAge},
user_race = #{userRace},
race = #{race},
qq = #{qq},
user_phone = #{userPhone},
taobao_account = #{taobaoAccount},
email = #{email},
wechat_account = #{wechatAccount},
education = #{education},
marital_status = #{maritalStatus},
present_address = #{presentAddress},
present_address_distinct = #{presentAddressDistinct},
present_latitude = #{presentLatitude},
present_longitude = #{presentLongitude},
present_period = #{presentPeriod},
company_name = #{companyName},
company_address = #{companyAddress},
company_address_distinct = #{companyAddressDistinct},
company_longitude = #{companyLongitude},
company_latitude = #{companyLatitude},
company_phone = #{companyPhone},
company_period = #{companyPeriod},
first_contact_name = #{firstContactName},
first_contact_phone = #{firstContactPhone},
frist_contact_relation = #{fristContactRelation},

second_contact_relation = #{secondContactRelation},

zm_status = #{zmStatus},
invite_userid = #{inviteUserid},
head_portrait = #{headPortrait},
idcard_img_z = #{idcardImgZ},
idcard_img_f = #{idcardImgF},
equipment_number = #{equipmentNumber},
user_contact_size = #{userContactSize},
csjy = #{csjy},
work_industry = #{workIndustry},
update_time=NOW()
where id = #{id}

update user_info
amount_max = #{amountMax},
amount_available = #{amountAvailable},
amount_addsum = #{amountAddsum},
update_time = NOW()
where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `lightningCash`.`channel_user_push` ( `channel_id`, `push_id`, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{userFrom}, #{pushId}, NOW(), NOW() );
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM channel_user_push WHERE push_id =#{pushId} and channel_id=#{userFrom}
SELECT c.push_id AS pushId,c.channel_id AS channelId FROM channel_user_push c LEFT JOIN user_info a ON c.push_id = a.invite_userid WHERE a.id = #{userId}

select id as id, jxl_token as jxlToken, jxl_token_time as jxlTokenTime, jxl_status as jxlStatus, jxl_detail as jxlDetail, jxl_detail_time as jxlDetailTime, jxl_detail_status as jxlDetailStatus, jxl_zj_dk_num as jxlZjDkNum, jxl_bj_dk_num as jxlBjDkNum, jxl_yj_hf as jxlYjHf, jxl_link2_days as jxlLink2Days, jxl_link1_days as jxlLink1Days, jxl_link2_num as jxlLink2Num, jxl_link1_num as jxlLink1Num, jxl_link2_order as jxlLink2Order, jxl_link1_order as jxlLink1Order, jxl_gj_ts as jxlGjTs, jxl_total as jxlTotal, jxl_gj_bl as jxlGjBl, jxl_lx_gj_ts as jxlLxGjTs, jxl_ht_phone_num as jxlHtPhoneNum, jxl_amth_num as jxlAmthNum, jxl_phone_reg_days as jxlPhoneRegDays, jxl_time as jxlTime, jxl_realName as jxlRealName, jxl_same_phone_card as jxlSamePhoneCard from user_info where id = #{id}
mapper.update: update user_info set td_status = #{tdStatus}, td_task_id = #{tdTaskId}, td_verify_time = #{tdVerifyTime}, td_verify_next_time = #{tdVerifyNextTime}, td_raw_data = #{tdRawData}, update_time=NOW() where id = #{id}

update user_info
zm_status = #{zmStatus},
zm_score_time = #{zmScoreTime},
zm_token = #{zmToken},
update_time = NOW()
where id = #{id}

update user_info
td_status = #{tdStatus},
update_time = NOW()
where id = #{id}

update user_info set marital_status = #{maritalStatus}, present_period = #{presentPeriod}, company_name = #{companyName}, company_address = #{companyAddress}, work_industry = #{workIndustry}, update_time = NOW() where id = #{id}
update user_info set customer_type = '1' where id = #{userId}
